Two ‘zombie’ snapper caught in Auckland suggests disease more widespread https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/two-zombie-snapper-caught-in-auckland-suggests-disease-more-widespread/YLJWCWSGKFES5PAMF6UEWKOLOE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/two-zombie-snapper-caught-in-auckland-suggests-disease-more-widespread/YLJWCWSGKFES5PAMF6UEWKOLOE/ Denise PiperThe sick snapper caught near Port Albert suggest the problem is widespread. Sun, 09 Jun 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Steph Treadwell caught nine snapper near Port Albert on Saturday. Two of them were clearly sick and she says "zombie fish" is an appropriate term for how they looked, with sunken faces and eyes.
